text: Momina ta ti nai hun jasale allaha ra usako rasulama purna visvasa gardachan. Ra jaba kunai samuhika visayako lagi ekatrita hunchan, taba unisita anumati na li'ikana kahimpani ga'ihaldainan. He paigambara! Juna manisaharu timisita anumati prapta gardachan ti nai allaha ra tyasako rasulama visvasa garneharu hunchan. Tasartha jaba yiniharu timisita kunai kamako lagi anumati cahanchan, tyasa vakhata tiniharumadhye jasala'i cahanchau, anumati dine gara ra uniharuko lagi allahasamga ksamako prarthana garnegara. Nihsandeha allaha bado ksamasila, atyanta dayavana cha
